entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as a person who fought violence with violence and authorized the use of Unforgivable Curses against suspects. He had supporters who thought he was going about things the right way.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a person who disappeared, and it looked like only a matter of time until Crouch got the top job. He was also being sought by Death Eaters to return him to power.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as a person who smiled grimly and told Hermione about Crouch's son being caught with Death Eaters.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who gasped when she heard that Crouch's son was caught with Death Eaters.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is mentioned as an animal to whom Sirius threw his chicken bone.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as a group who managed to talk their way out of Azkaban and were trying to find Voldemort and return him to power.

relationships.description: Crouch wanted to return Voldemort to power, as it looked like only a matter of time until he got the top job.
Death Eaters were trying to find Voldemort and return him to power.
